name: Drift Mania 2 - Drifting Car Racing Game
name_original: Drift Mania 2 - Drifting Car Racing Game
description:
Drift Mania 2 delivers the ultimate drift car racing experience with its highly addictive and authentic gameplay and high definition graphics.

Enjoy hours of drift car racing by racing on your choice of over 12+ race tracks to test your car driving skills! Choose from over 13 different dream cars that can be customized to fit your racing style! Max out your race car stats to quickly improve your performance and win more races! Compete globally with drivers from all over the world with global leaderboards! Each race track features objectives and achievements to complete to progress your racing career! Drifting is the ultimate motor sport, and you can now become a true drift racing champion with Drift Mania 2!


More Features Include:


CUSTOMIZE YOUR DRIFTING RACE CAR TO CREATE YOUR DREAM CAR
Fully customize your vehicle appearance with body kits, custom wheels, windows tints and spoilers. Make it your one of a kind drift beast!

UPGRADE YOUR CAR PERFORMANCE AND STATS
Upgrade your ride by installing aftermarket performance products from licensed brands including Royal Purple, K&N, Magnaflow, Centerforce, Whiteline and Mishimoto.

TUNE YOUR CAR
Adjust different performance aspects of your car including the suspension, steering sensitivity, gear ratio and weight distribution to suit your own driving style.

HIGH DEFINITION GRAPHICS
Drift Mania Championship 2 includes next generation 3D graphics specially optimized for your mobile hardware to provide you with the best drifting experience.

BECOME A DRIFT MANIA CHAMPION
Complete the career mode which includes over 13 drifting race tracks, 60 achievements and 48 car performance upgrades to unlock. Accumulate cash to upgrade your dream car with visual and performance modifications to ensure you progress to become the Drift King!

DRIFT BATTLE
Start a drift tournament, compete in tandem against an opponent while making your way to the finals!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MODE
Challenge your friends to a drift battle! Share and brag your results with your friends on Twitter.

GLOBAL DRIFT RACING LEADERBOARDS
See your ranking against other players worldwide using the Drift Mania 2 online leaderboards. Submit your high scores and expose your accomplishments to the world.

GAME CONTROLLER
Compatible with most game controllers available.

LOADED WITH FEATURES
•Supports all latest devices and tablets
•Fully customizable controls including element repositioning and sensitivity adjustments
•Accelerometer (gyroscope) and virtual wheel steering mode
•Variable throttle bar system or pedal accelerator controls
•13 high-performance vehicles with unique specs
•13 drift circuits to master from different locations
•48 performance upgrades per vehicle
•Hundreds of visual mods including body kits, spoilers, window tints, wheels and custom paint job
•Tuning mode to adjust all aspects of your vehicle
•3 level of difficulties
•5 race camera configurations
•Full race replays
•Soundtrack from A'n'R Music Limited including songs from Templeton Pek and KNGDMS
•Exclusive content including drift event photos

-------------------------------------------------------------------

•Available in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Chinese
